# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth every penny of its $1000000 value to you. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this item at the same price point. Should you have any inquiries or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity of serving you with this remarkable product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,000,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,000,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
